attributes.action: Compensate the covid-19 vaccine injured and bereaved
attributes.additional_details: The government has given the pharmaceutical companies indemnities against being sued if you have a severe reaction or death after a covid-19 vaccine so they should fairly compensate the covid-19 vaccine injured and bereaved families where they have proof that the vaccine has caused death or injury.
attributes.background: The government has given the pharmaceutical companies indemnities against being sued if you have a severe reaction or death after a covid-19 vaccine so they should fairly compensate the covid-19 vaccine injured and bereaved families where they have proof that the vaccine has caused death or injury.

rejection.details:
There is already a Vaccine Damage Payment scheme for people are severely disabled, or has died, as a result of certain vaccinations, including vaccinations against covid-19. You can find out more about this scheme here: https://www.gov.uk/vaccine-damage-payment

We can accept petitions calling for changes to this scheme, but it would need to be clear what changes you wanted to be made.
